title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout.
description: When pressing the Delete button in the Coolbar, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of staying on the second row, the Launch item is moved to the first row. This issue is observed in Build 2002071610021.
OB:
1. Press the Delete button. 
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted. 
3. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. 
Expected Result: The Launch item should stay on the second row.
EB:
1. Run the attached test case. 
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem). 
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, put it after the Open Type item. 
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, put it after the Launch coolitem. 
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), put it after the Search coolitem. 
6. Press the Delete button. 
7. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs. 
Expected Result: The second row should remain.
SR:
1. Run the attached test case. 
2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row. 
3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, put it after the Script item. 
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, put it after the Launch coolitem. 
5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, put it after the Search coolitem. 
6. Press the Delete button. 
7. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted. 
8. Verify that the second row remains.
